maps.name: fishing
maps.desc: Famous for the best fishermen and boat makers in Sansinukob, the Fishing Region is also known as a peace-loving region. Despite this, it’s the only one that employs a slavery system. This way of life has persisted since its people are known to be sticklers for tradition.
maps.sub: Dive into the Fishing Region by becoming a member of one of the tribes!
